openapi: 3.0.0
info:
    title: Service Model
    version: 2.4.0
paths:
    /networkAccessProfile:
        get:
            tags:
            - AccessProfile
            operationId: getList
            parameters:
            - name: id
              in: query
              schema:
                  type: string
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: OK
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: array
                                items:
                                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/accessProfileBO'
servers:
- url: 'https://api.com/{access}/accessProfileAPI'
  variables:
      access:
          default: unknown
components:
    parameters:
        fields:
            name: fields
            in: query
            schema:
                type: string
    schemas:
        accessProfileBO:
            $ref: ../BO/Resource/ApiSpecificationBO.json
